data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/2GB3sdsWn3drlkwGMMNQ3KFNbIV.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":100000000,"genres":[{"id":14,"name":"Fantasy"},{"id":28,"name":"Action"},{"id":12,"name":"Adventure"},{"id":10751,"name":"Family"}],"homepage":"http://www.eragonmovie.com/","id":2486,"imdb_id":"tt0449010","origin_country":["US","GB"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"Eragon","overview":"In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realized he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.","popularity":36.427,"poster_path":"/mNu6QLUnKqPIjRA3pgEb5dkJye6.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":711,"logo_path":"/tEiIH5QesdheJmDAqQwvtN60727.png","name":"Fox 2000 Pictures","origin_country":"US"},{"id":1302,"logo_path":"/zC3b70ixHh89qJIikLQPEvLqbPM.png","name":"Davis Entertainment","origin_country":"US"},{"id":444,"logo_path":null,"name":"Dune Entertainment","origin_country":"US"},{"id":445,"logo_path":null,"name":"Major Studio Partners","origin_country":"US"},{"id":2735,"logo_path":null,"name":"Mid Atlantic Films","origin_country":"HU"},{"id":25,"logo_path":"/qZCc1lty5FzX30aOCVRBLzaVmcp.png","name":"20th Century Fox","origin_country":"US"},{"id":290,"logo_path":"/jrgCuaQsY9ouP5ILZf4Dq4ZOkIX.png","name":"Ingenious Media","origin_country":"GB"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"GB","name":"United Kingdom"},{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"},{"iso_3166_1":"HU","name":"Hungary"}],"release_date":"2006-12-14","revenue":249300000,"runtime":104,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"As darkness falls, the last dragon will choose its rider.","title":"Eragon","video":false,"vote_average":5.1,"vote_count":3177}
